title: Luxury Amenities - 2nd Chance - Relocation Services - 6 Weeks FREE
posting_body: ['- Houston, TX, 77002', '1 bedroom', '$1,490-2,750', '/mo', '520-1,158', 'sf', '2 bedroom', '$3,140-4,000', '/mo', '1,185-1,522', 'sf', 'Special:', '6wks free w/12+mo LNL', 'Deposit:', '300-400', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats:Yes\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Dogs:Yes', 'Built:', '2019', 'Location:', 'Montrose/ Museum/ Midtown', 'Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability', 'Features:', "Sky Lounge with 360 degree city views, zen lounge, Houston's biggest pool deck & swim-up bar, Fitness center, yoga studio/lawn free wifi, Large Pet park and Pet wash, BBQ Grills and VIP Cabanas, Ground floor Retail, Valet, Concierge, Dry cleaning pick up/drop off, Package lockers, Ground Floor Retail, Bike Shop & Bike Fix Station", 'Community Amenities:', 'Electric Car Chargers, Assigned parking, Gated entrance, Pool, Game/Sport room, Community parking garage, Fitness center, Dry cleaning service, Bus stop, Maid service, Dog Park, Furnished units, Elevators, Business center, Club house, Free WiFi Areas, Concierge Services', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Walk-in showers, Non-carpeted flooring, Premium Countertops, Microwaves, Storage closet outside, Premium Appliances, Custom built-ins, W/D machines, Private patios/balconies, High ceilings, Garbage disposals, Ceiling fans, Walk-in closets, Garden/large tubs, Cable ready, Frost free refrigerators, Hi-speed internet, Self cleaning ovens, Intrusion alarms, Dishwashers, Ice makers', 'For more information about this community contact:', 'Lauren Smith\xa0\xa0(Agent)', 'Texas Apartment Experts', 'show contact info', 'Ig: LeasingTXwithLauren', 'Locations all over Houston and the Greater Houston Area', 'All Price Ranges', '2nd', 'Chance - case by case', 'Ads/ images are examples of communities.', 'Text me for a listing specific for your wants and needs!', 'Pricing, Availabilty and specials subject to change daily.']
